headline: Dominion Energy reminds customers to stay alert for utility scams as holiday season approaches
summary: RICHMOND, Va., November 17, 2025--As the holiday season approaches, Dominion Energy reminds customers to stay alert for utility scams. While scam tactics evolve year to year, utility scams remain a persistent threat, so it’s important for customers to know the warning signs and what you should do if you’re targeted.
